segments.text: Which kind would you like ? We have five different varieties of facials .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , since it's summer , and I had looked that you had quite a bit sun , I'll recommend our summer special , it's specially suited for individuals with sensitive skin .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The facial will start with thorough cleansing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Does it include facial mask and massage ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , the reviving mask will promote blood circulation and tighten your skin . You can also choose to get hand or back massage as well .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Will it exfoliate the skin as well ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , we also apply a special day cream that protect the skin from the sun and the night cream that moisturize to the skin .
segments.speaker: S2
